data.quote: It Always Seems impossible until its done
data.author: Nelson Mandela

data.quote: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough
data.author: Og mandino

data.quote: it does not matter how slowly you go as you do not stop.
data.author: Confucius

data.quote: The past can not changed .The future is yet in your power.
data.author: Unkonwn

data.quote: optimism is the faith that leads to achivement,nothing can be done without hope and confidance
data.author: Helen Keller

data.quote: With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts
data.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

data.quote: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement.
data.author: helen kellen

data.quote: Where there is a will, there is a way. If there is a chance in a million that you can do something, anything, to keep what you want from ending, do it. Pry the door open or, if need be, wedge your foot in that door and keep it open.
data.author: Pauline Kael

data.quote: Press forward. Do not stop, do not linger in your journey, but strive for the mark set before you.
data.author: George Whitefield

data.quote: Donâ€™t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
data.author: Sam Levenson

data.quote: Aim for the moon. If you miss, you may hit a star.
data.author: W. Clement Stone
